description: Detects Certipy a tool for Active Directory Certificate Services enumeration and abuse based on PE metadata characteristics and common command line arguments.
author: pH-T (Nextron Systems)
name: HackTool - Certipy Execution
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\Certipy.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"Certipy.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.Description:*Certipy*))) OR ((process.command_line.text:("*\ auth\ *" OR "*\ find\ *" OR "*\ forge\ *" OR "*\ relay\ *" OR "*\ req\ *" OR "*\ shadow\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*\ \-bloodhound*" OR "*\ \-ca\-pfx\ *" OR "*\ \-dc\-ip\ *" OR "*\ \-kirbi*" OR "*\ \-old\-bloodhound*" OR "*\ \-pfx\ *" OR "*\ \-target*" OR "*\ \-username\ *" OR "*\ \-vulnerable*" OR "*auth\ \-pfx*" OR "*shadow\ auto*" OR "*shadow\ list*"))))
